volunteer.summary: CASA HOGAR wants to provide a home for young girls in the Colombian region Chocó where they are protected from exploitation and prostitution and where they can feel safe. We want to provide a place where they can experience positive support and empowerment, where they can study in peace and receive a diploma that qualifies them for university education.
